DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate discriminant metabolite urine patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) healthy individual . Then determine patient 's metabolic fingerprint could predict development flare-up RA .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolome Analysis Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Compare metabolites RA patient healthy individual . 1 . Collection urine sample 2 . Assessing urine metabolite 1H NMR spectroscopy 3 . Analyzing relationship metabolites clinical variable
DOC.criteria: All patient rheumatoid arthritis meet 2010 American College Rheumatology/European League Rheumatism classification criterion . Comorbid autoimmune disease Confirmed amyloidosis Chronic kidney disease ( estimate GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 ) Chronic liver disease Thyroid disease Pregnancy Solid tumor/hematologic malignancy within 5 year
